Detailed Description

A RatingBar is an extension of SeekBar and ProgressBar that shows a rating in stars.

The user can touch or drag to set the rating when using the default size RatingBar.

When using a RatingBar that supports user interaction, placing widgets to the left or right of the RatingBar is discouraged.

The number of stars set will be shown when the layout width is set to wrap content (if another layout width is set, the results may be unpredictable).

The secondary progress should not be modified by the client as it is used internally as the background for a fractionally filled star.

The following example demonstrates how to use the RatingBar

 gaia::ui::RatingBar* mpRatingBar = new gaia::ui::RatingBar(static_cast<Page*>(this));

 // Set the current progress to the specified value.
 mpRatingBar->setProgress(100);

Definition at line 42 of file RatingBar.h.
